BlockGDoV.title: Block Graphic Depictions of Violence
BlockGDoV.description: Block access to fanworks that contain graphic depiction of violence.

BlockMDeath.title: Block Major Character Death
BlockMDeath.description: Block access to fanworks that contain major character death.

BlockUnderage.title: Block Underage Sex
BlockUnderage.description: Block access to fanworks that contain underage sex.

BlockNonCon.title: Block Non-Con
BlockNonCon.description: Block access to fanworks that contain non-consensual sex.

BlockAnyWarning.title: Block Possible Archive Warnings
BlockAnyWarning.description: Blocks any work with possible Archive Warnings

LimitAgeRange.title: Limit Age Rating
LimitAgeRange.description: Block access to anything above the set age range. Can be 'general', 'teen', 'mature', or 'explicit'.

BlockUnratedWorks.title: Block Unrated Works
BlockUnratedWorks.description: Block fanworks that don't have a maturity rating attached to them.
